resume.summary: Full stack Software Application Developer with 7+ years of Experience in Business interaction, Requirement Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, and Documentation phases. Experience in designing and developing multi-tier applications using Java, J2EE, JDBC, Spring, Hibernate, XML, SOAP, REST, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JSON, and JUnit. Extensive experience in using MVC (Model View Controller) architecture for developing applications using JSP, JavaBeans, and Servlets. Worked on a different Web Application server such as WebLogic, JBoss, Web Sphere, and Tomcat. Extensive experience in different IDEs like Eclipse, IntelliJ, VS Code, and NetBeans. Experience in Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD) techniques using UML in Visio. Proficient in using RDBMS concepts with Oracle, DB2, Postgres and MySQL. Git, GitHub, Azure DevOps, CD/CD, Rally, Jira. Experience in PL/SQL, stored procedures, functions, and SQL Scripts for relational databases. Good communication and analytical skills and a demonstrated ability to handle multiple tasks as well as work independently or in a team. Highly proficient in understanding new technologies and accomplishing projects goals. Good work ethic and willingness to work hard to achieve employer objectives. Extensive experience working in an Agile development environment.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
